name: Save The Dog - Dog Escape
description:
Save The Dog is a casual puzzle game. You draw lines with your fingers to create walls that protect the dog from attacks by bees in the hive. You need to protect the dog with the painted wall for 10 seconds during the attack of the bees, hold on and you will win the game.

How to play:
1. Swipe the screen to create a wall to protect the dog;
2. As long as you don't let go, you can always draw the line;
3. You can let go after producing a satisfactory pattern;
4. Wait for the bees in the hive to attack;
5. Hold your wall for 10 seconds, so that the dog will not be attacked by bees;
6. You will win the game.

Game Features:
1. A variety of customs clearance methods;
2. Easy and funny customs clearance patterns;
3. Funny dog expressions;
4. Puzzle and interesting levels.

Welcome to try our game, if you have any comments on the game, you can give feedback in the game, thank you for your participation.
